scopeLabel.description:
It can be used to mark a range for Option to display the data more clearly. 

This is only displayed when numerical values are displayed.

value.description: Please ensure that the values are unique. Multiple options with consistent values will be considered the same option.

hidden.description: It's best not to use it! Because visible is enough.

defer.description: Delayed loading of data after marking

deferApi.description: If set, the priority is higher. If it is not set, the source interface is used to load.

loading.description: Tags are loading. Only meaningful if defer is true. Internal fields cannot be set externally

loaded.description: It only makes sense if defer is set, internal fields cannot be set externally
